fullplot: Luis, a recognized university professor, out of the psychiatric clinic, where he spent the last three years, hospitalized after a psychotic episode that led him to threaten his wife and assistant chair. Clinical believe he is healed, but a relapse is always possible. Upon arriving home, Luis is attacked by her pet cat. Soon after, his wife note that the cat disappeared. Was Luis, ex-crazy, that ended the cat a new psychotic attack aggressiveness?
